text.intro: Twitterverse of Belgrade anti-government protests against media censorship, political violence and rising autocracy in Serbia. There are 4958 nodes and 10298 edges. The network consists of tweets containing the hashtag #1od5miliona, posted between January 5, 0:46 AM,  and January 10, 13:06 PM. Two nodes are linked if one user retweets another user's tweet. The network suggests a clear polarization between pro- and anti-regime communities, and the strong involvement of a few pro-regime users in diffusing information. ..
text.title: Anti-government protests in Belgrade, January 5: #1od5miliona
